message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $8,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend this exclusive opportunity at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable deal and experience the full potential of our product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
